content:
The Commander of the Air Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine Lieutenant General Mykola Oleshchuk showed the work of air defense of hostile air targets in the southern direction.

Video Commander of the Armed Forcesplacedon Facebook.

“March 17, 2024. Southern direction. And so - every night ...

Thank you to the defenders of the sky for the successful combat work! Together to victory!" He said.

As reportedArmyinform, today, at night, the forces of defense destroyed 14 of 16 enemy UAVs, all in the Odessa region.
title: As the night Ukrainian aircraft knocked out Russian "Shahda" in the south
description: Video commander of the Armed Forces of Ukraine posted on Facebook. “March 17, 2024. Southern...
author: Army Inform
